content.text:
Mr. BLUNT. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate 
stand in recess as under the previous order until 2:15 p.m. today.
content.speaker: Mr. BLUNT

content.text:
There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:19 p.m., recessed until 
2:15 p.m. and reassembled when called to order by the Presiding Officer 
(Mrs. Capito).
content.speaker: The RECORDER
